short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Standardizes text by replacing accented characters with normal equivalents on the Canada Post postal code lookup page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AddressCleaner is a Chrome extension designed to streamline address handling by automatically replacing accented characters with their standard equivalents on the Canada Post postal code lookup page. This enhancement ensures that addresses are standardized, making them more compatible with external systems and reducing potential issues with data validation and processing.

Features:

Automatic Character Replacement: Seamlessly converts accented characters to their plain equivalents.
Targeted Functionality: Specifically designed for use on the Canada Post postal code lookup page.
Enhanced Compatibility: Helps ensure that addresses are in a format that meets the requirements of various validation systems and delivery services.
Why Use AddressCleaner? Special characters in addresses can sometimes cause issues with validation and processing systems. AddressCleaner resolves this by standardizing address data, which can improve accuracy and prevent disruptions in address handling workflows.

How It Works: Once installed, AddressCleaner automatically applies the necessary character replacements on the Canada Post postal code lookup page, ensuring that all address data is formatted correctly for downstream systems.

Note: This extension operates exclusively on the Canada Post postal code lookup page, maintaining a focused approach to address standardization.

Privacy and Security: AddressCleaner only interacts with the specified page and does not collect or store any personal data. Your privacy is a top priority.

Get Started:

Install AddressCleaner from the Chrome Web Store.
Visit the Canada Post postal code lookup page.
The extension will automatically handle character replacements as you use the site.
